Integration of adaptation into plans and policies in a multi-sectorial way
Have you undertaken comprehensive maps of the risks and vulnerabilities of the territory?

Have specific adaptation actions been identified and prioritised accordingly? (including clear synergies and potential trade-offs with e.g. mitigation, environment and disaster risk management policies)

Have relevant organisation and coordination been put in place? (i.e. clear role and contributions assigned to the different departments)
